lines:
39 Peterborost

Boston, Mane

nov. 27,1917

cer

or

Dear

fri Steam

that rus folks had to leave

hand at Tintin, 
te water had meceeded to get 
in the house to a depete 
4 feet in one day. Trong e 
don't know where may folks are 
for them have not written me

se plember Ang 
However, I am mere

dans une

since

me w

Hosinh

are well.

to ask TK Liang 
ks. Mok to conte as 
their week end ante me 
ties Calardan Dec. 1st. It has 
two rooms here which are 
comfortable enough to ec -
commodate them 
please be kind enough

leave 
is

out hem

grout veen 
come. I shareale care 
& stem while they are here

was intending is 
come te see you a mrs.stall

as ever

SS lawan
raw: 39 Peterborost Boston, Mane nov. 27,1917 cer or Dear fri Steam that rus folks had to leave hand at Tintin, te water had meceeded to get in the house to a depete 4 feet in one day. Trong e don't know where may folks are for them have not written me se plember Ang However, I am mere dans une since me w Hosinh are well. to ask TK Liang ks. Mok to conte as their week end ante me ties Calardan Dec. 1st. It has two rooms here which are comfortable enough to eccommodate them please be kind enough leave is out hem grout veen come. I shareale care & stem while they are here was intending is come te see you a mrs.stall as ever SS lawan

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter asking for leave for T. K. Liang and K. S. Mok so that they may visit Kwan. States that he will meet with Dr. Eddy and is interesed in offering a Chinese entertainment for friends. Asks advice regarding making presentations to raise flood relief funds for Tientsin. States that he has not heard from his parents since they left their home in August.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
